description:
In this course you will learn how to elaborate your own fragrance without having any previous knowledge.

You will have the opportunity to seduce and impress your other halfwith this fragrance, shall it be a sofisticated night perfume, a fresh daily use or one specifically designed for success in a romantic encouter

¿HOW WILL YOU LEARN?

I will teach and guide you through STEP BY STEP lessons, with simple, clear but exhaustive VIDEOS, so you can make a perfume in a very short time, saving a lot of money.

If you have any doubt, I will be here to help you. Just send me your question in the “Technical help” section and you will get your answer.

¿BENEFIT YOU WILL GET?

This course is the first step to introduce you into the thrilling world of perfumery, from your own home and at your own pace.
title: How to create your own perfume with formulas
